title: Job Openings at Spar Market
content:
Spar Market is a private indigenous company incorporated in 1984, catering services to various sectors in Nigeria. Being a pioneer in setting up organized retail, we are one of Nigeria's largest hypermarkets with a presence in various states of Nigeria. With the objective to promote investment by offering customers facilities on international standards in Nigeria, from being just a supermarket, we have evolved to be a multi-faced store addressing almost all possible needs of the consumer.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Cook

Job Location: Ilupeju, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a Cook to prepare and serve high-quality meals in line with our standards.


Key Duties


	Prepare meals according to set recipes and quality standards.
	Maintain hygiene and cleanliness in the kitchen.
	Monitor inventory and report shortages.
	Ensure compliance with food safety regulations.


Requirements


	Certificate or training in Culinary Arts or related field.
	Minimum of 2 years of cooking experience.
	Ability to work efficiently in a fast-paced environment.


Salary
Attractive

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Ilupeju.hr@sparnigeria.com using "Cook" as the subject of the mail.

 

 

2.) Refrigeration & Air-Conditioning (R & A) Technician

Job Location: Ilupeju, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We require a qualified Refrigeration & Air-Conditioning (R & A) Technician to support the maintenance of cooling systems within the organization.


Key Duties


	Install, service, and repair refrigeration and AC units.
	Troubleshoot faults and perform preventive maintenance.
	Ensure all systems operate safely and efficiently.


Requirements


	OND/Technical certification in Refrigeration & Air-Conditioning.
	Minimum of 2 years of relevant experience.
	Strong diagnostic and technical skills.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Ilupeju.hr@sparnigeria.com using "R & A Technician" as the subject of the mail.

 

 

3.) Electrician

Job Location: Ilupeju, Anthony, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a competent Electrician to join our Technical team.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for the installation, maintenance, and repair of electrical systems within the store.


Responsibilities


	Troubleshoot and repair electrical faults.
	Carry out routine checks and preventive maintenance.
	Install and maintain wiring, fixtures, and electrical equipment.
	Ensure compliance with safety and electrical standards.


Requirements


	OND/Technical certification in Electrical Engineering or related field.
	Minimum of 2 years of experience.
	Strong knowledge of electrical systems and safety procedures.
	Ability to work independently with attention to detail.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Ilupeju.hr@sparnigeria.com using "Electrician" as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

Treasury Manager Job at O'la-kleen Nigeria Limited




        
    

        
        O'la-kleen Nigeria Limited is Nigeria's foremost cleaning service company with a brand name used as a reference point both locally and internationally. The company has continued to exceed the expectations of clients thereby defining service excellence in the cleaning industry. O'la-kleen Nigeria Limited renders services for the corporate organisation as well as individuals with our clients list ranging from the American Embassy, Central Bank of Nigeria and Nigerian Breweries to mention but a few.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Treasury Manager

Job Location: Lagos

Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Head of Treasury is responsible for cash and liquidity management, funding, risk management related to company’s financial activities, Customer Credit Management and treasury operations and controls.
	She/he is responsible to assess, monitor, plan and manage the efficient utilization of cash and financial services in a manner consistent with the objectives of the Company and also take on ad-hoc function(s) clearly agreed, with the GHR and GMD.
	Understand, manage, and supervise all aspects of cash flow. 
	Negotiating loan or overdraft terms with banks.
	Creating solutions to new financial challenges by applying financial/treasury knowledge.
	Liaising with bankers and maintaining positive working relationships.
	Monitor bank service fees and address quality issues.
	Conduct benchmark studies of banks and their services to evaluate whether it fits Company’s requirements.
	Evaluate alternative long-term borrowing strategies and make recommendations in accordance with the capital structure guidelines.
	Providing guidance on special financing products (e.g. Lease models, Export
	Programs) and liaising with related financial service providers.
	Forecast daily cash requirements and execute daily financing decisions. 
	Direct, monitor and trade investment portfolios including Working capital, High-Yield, Escrow, and other portfolios. 
	Manage long-term and short-term investment strategies. 
	Determine the Company’s tax position and the applicability of taxable/non-taxable instruments. 
	Assess performance benchmarks and recommend changes when warranted. 
	Review and recommend changes to the investment policies based on the market conditions. 
	Prepare or monitor company’s various cash flow forecasts and perform financial modelling. 
	Evaluate, develop and implement cash management systems to optimize efficiencies. 
	Ensuring that the company's cash flow is adequate to allow it to operate effectively.
	Forecasting cash payments and anticipating challenges arising from limited cash flow and perform financial modelling.
	Evaluate, develop and implement cash management systems to optimize efficiencies.
	Manage payments by cheques, international wire, Electronic Fund Transfer (EFT) and Automated Clearing House.
	Support and participate in Strategic Plan activities. 
	Additional duties as directed by the CFO and GMD 


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess relevant qualifications, with 15 - 18 years of work experience.
	Professional qualifications in Accounting (ICAN, ACCA etc)


Salary
N500,000 - N750,000 Monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV to: recruitment@olakleenholdings.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

HR / Legal Compliance Manager Job at Swift Consulting Limited




        
    

        
        Swift Consulting Limited - Our client, an HR and legal firm, is currently seeking qualified and experienced applicants to fill the position below:

Job Position: HR / Legal Compliance Manager

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Provide legal advice and guidance on internal and external matters affecting the company
	Draft, review, and negotiate company agreements and contracts
	Manage recruitment, onboarding, performance appraisals, and employee relations
	Develop and implement HR policies, procedures, and best practices
	Prepare employment contracts, offer letters, and HR-related legal documentation
	Ensure compliance with labour laws, regulatory requirements, and company standards
	Support senior management in strategic HR planning and workforce development
	Coordinate disciplinary processes and handle conflict resolution
	Maintain employee records and HR management systems.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Law (LLB)
	Minimum of 2–5 years of proven experience as an HR / Legal Officer, HR Associate, Legal Associate, or similar role
	BL qualification and active membership of the Bar (Nigerian Bar Association) are compulsory.
	Experience in policy drafting and HR administration
	Strong understanding of labour and employment laws in Nigeria
	Strong interpersonal and negotiation skills
	Ability to maintain confidentiality and handle sensitive information professionally
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hireme@swiftconsulting.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
